body_html:
albenoit ,

Thank you for your information
I have devtoolset-4 gcc (GCC) 5.2.1 on rel6
#############
dsapadmn@vcld002370 bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ scl enable devtoolset-4 bash
[dsapadmn@vcld002370 bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ which gcc
/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc
[dsapadmn@vcld002370 bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ gcc --version
gcc (GCC) 5.2.1 20150902 (Red Hat 5.2.1-2)

############
I follow your instruction,

357 14:28 unzip ../bazel-0.8.0-dist.zip
361 14:34 ./compile.sh

it hang in there like this
[dsapadmn@vcld002370 bazel-0.8.0-dist]$ ./compile.sh
ðŸ�ƒ Building Bazel from scratch

no respose, Could you please attach your 10:58 AM

tools/cpp/CROSSTOOL file here, so that I can compare?

Thank you for all your helps in advance

   361    14:34    ./compile.sh
